alfredsnippet.snippet: Thank you for the email and for voicing your concerns — we understand how challenging the situation might become for you and the broader fintech ecosystem. We are monitoring the situation very closely and are discussing internally to assess the impact as well as identify levers to help our customers. While I don’t have specific updates just yet, I’m confident we will have more information to share with you within the next week or so.
alfredsnippet.name: COVID-19 Relief
